Features LLM providers (Anthropic, OpenAI, Google Gemini, Ollama), multi-layer memory, reasoning strategies (ReAct, Plan-Execute, ToT, Reflexion), tool execution, guardrails, verification, cost tracking, and multi-agent orchestration.

title: liteshperumalla/Smart-Tutor-AI-AI-Driven-Personalized-Teaching-Support

Smart Tutor AI (STA) bridges this gap by providing professor-validated course materials, ensuring students receive precise and relevant content.
